title: Conversation Frontmatter
description: Validates the YAML frontmatter of conversation files in .project/conversations/. Conversations are archived AI sessions with structured metadata for discovery and Tier 1 catalog building.

id.description: Unique identifier for this conversation (e.g., conv-20240115-auth).

title.description: Human-readable title summarizing the conversation topic.

summary.description: Brief summary of the conversation outcomes and decisions. Used as the Tier 1 descriptor for relevance matching.

date.description: Date the conversation took place (ISO 8601 date format).

participants.description: List of participant identifiers involved in the conversation.

provider.description: AI provider used for this conversation (e.g., anthropic, openai).

format.description: Format of the conversation body content.
